org.mini2Dx.injection

Class SingletonBeanRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.injection.SingletonBeanRepository

  • public class SingletonBeanRepository
extends Object
    A repository for storing and autowiring singletons To perform any write operations to the repository the open() method must be called first. Once writing is finished, the close() method must called.
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman
    See Also:
    Singleton Pattern, Dependency Injection
